contents.content: 第三部分 三种句子类型
第三章 主从复合句
第八节 拓展练习20题
It is known that the Little Ice Age cooling began in Greenland and the Arctic in about 1200.

contents.title: 因此，许多温带鸟类用春季日益增加的日照长度作为开始筑巢的提示，因为这个时候可以保证食物的充足来源。

contents.content: What I'll do is fill in a form with you to find out a little more about your preferences and so forth.

So, what we're going to do now is look at a short presentation in which you'll see all these tools.

Given that a fundamental goal of education is to transfer the control of learning from teachers to pupils, improving pupils' learning to learn techniques should be a major outcome of the school experience, especially for the highly competent.
Halley was aware that the AU was one of the most fundamental of all astronomical measurements.
Besides the laboratory evidence for this, we know from our experience that we often remember what we have perceived peripherally, long after we have forgotten what we set out to learn.
One interesting correlation Manton uncovered is that better-educated people are likely to live longer.
But in fact, the general agreement among experts is that learning a second language is good for children.
This is because ATC control of the entire space is essential.
Some researchers say the results constitute compelling evidence that telepathy is genuine.
In addition, there is some physical evidence that the ancient Egyptians were interested in flight.
Sandiford says that there is increasing evidence that female education, at any age, is an important health intervention in its own right.

In today's seminar, Grant Freeman, a biologist who specialises in identifying insects, and who works for the Australian Quarantine Service（澳大利亚检疫署）, has come to talk to us about his current research work.
Although tourism inevitably affects the region in which it takes place, the costs to these fragile environments and their local cultures can be minimised.

Thus many temperate-zone birds use the increasing day lengths in spring as a cue to begin the nesting cycle, because this is a point when adequate food resources will be assured.
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。It是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。What引导的是主语从句。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。It是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。what引导的是主语从句；in which引导的是定语从句，修饰a short presentation。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。Given that引导的是原因状语从句。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作形容词aware的宾语。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作动词know的宾语；该宾语从句本身又是一个多重主从复合句，we often remember是主句；what引导的是宾语从句，作动词remember的宾语；long after引导的是时间状语从句；该状语从句中又包含一个由what引导的宾语从句，作动词forgotten的宾语。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。Manton uncovered是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰correlation；that引导的是表语从句。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是表语从句。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，because引导的是表语从句。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。say后面是省略了引导词that的宾语从句；该宾语从句中又包含一个由that引导的同位语从句，作evidence的同位语。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是同位语从句，作evidence的同位语。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。第一个that引导的是宾语从句，作动词says的宾语；该从句中又包含一个由that引导的同位语从句，作evidence的同位语。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。两个who引导的都是定语从句，修饰Grant Freeman, a biologist；这两个定语从句由and连接，是同等关系。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。Although引导的是让步状语从句；该从句中又包含一个由in which引导的定语从句，修饰the region。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。if引导的是条件状语从句；who引导的是定语从句，修饰a candidate。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。why引导的是定语从句，修饰reasons。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。If引导的是条件状语从句，该从句中又包含一个由that引导的定语从句，修饰information；so that引导的是目的状语从句。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。第一个when引导的是时间状语从句；该从句中又包含一个由when引导的宾语从句，作tell的直接宾语。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。because引导的是原因状语从句；该从句中又包含一个由when引导的定语从句，修饰a point。
